title: Mera Twitter
description: Introducing 'Mera Twitter,' a social media app with all the major features of Twitter. Reimagining functionalities such as creating posts, bookmarks, and followers was a great undertaking to implement and learn. Give it a try to experience seamless posting, bookmarking, and connecting.

title: Kriyata
description: Kriyata was my major project in the final year of computer engineering. With Kriyata seamlessly navigate through the admin dashboard, effortlessly create tournaments, and let automatic fixtures streamline the competition. Kriyata is my solution to automate tournament management and seamlessly manage all tournaments.
